title: Best of The Herd: 04/05/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 04/05/2019
description:
Colin thinks Aaron Rodgers needs to grow up and get over a lot of these issues he's had with coaches and the organization.   He thinks LeBron and the Lakers are in a desperate situation not just a critical one.  Plus, Tyler Dunne of Bleacher Report who wrote the article uncovering all of the Packers dysfunction tells Colin why he stands by what he wrote despite denials from Mike McCarthy.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
